definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
to have dark circles under one's eyes/to have eyes like a panda
Wolong giant panda nature reserve in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan
pinyin: wo4 long2 da4 xiong2 mao1 bao3 hu4 qu1

sentences.english: It was found that giant pandas in Fopinghad tke habit of seasonal vertical movement.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，佛坪大熊貓有季節性垂直移動習性。

sentences.english: On this organisgotd with the sea! the pandas like to drink tea with pelike in soda.
sentences.chinese: 在海里的這個區域，熊貓們喜歡就着蘇打碗豆喝茶。

sentences.english: Baby giant pandas spend a lot of time drinking their mum's milk.
sentences.chinese: 小熊貓花費大量的時間喝他們媽媽的奶水。

sentences.english: To learn about the Wolong Panda Reserve was really interesting.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解到臥龍熊貓保護區的情況真有意思。

sentences.english: If farmers keep taking the land giants pandas will have nowhere to live.
sentences.chinese: 如果農民繼續攫娶土地，大熊貓就沒有地方可住了。

sentences.english: The flying hornbill represents our home state, Sarawak, taking us from Borneo to the host country, China, which is represented by the panda.
sentences.chinese: 犀鳥代表我們故鄉砂拉越，以及熊貓代表主人家中國。

sentences.english: In Chinese opinion, panda signifies peace.
sentences.chinese: 熊貓在中國人的心目中象徵着和平。

sentences.english: Have you been missing laughing babies and sneezing pandas?
sentences.chinese: 你以前錯過看笑不樂知的小寶貝和打噴嚏的熊貓嗎？

sentences.english: Artificial insemination was a significant breakthrough in panda conservation.
sentences.chinese: 人工受精是熊貓保護領域的重大突破。

sentences.english: In zoology, the giant panda is Carnivora.
sentences.chinese: 在動物學上，大熊貓屬食肉目。

sentences.english: You are reading this because it is about giant pandas.
sentences.chinese: 你在看這篇文章，是因爲它有關大熊貓。

sentences.english: The giant panda is one of the surviving ancient animals.
sentences.chinese: 大熊貓是一種殘存的古動物。

sentences.english: A. What are the major efforts made by human beings to restore the giant panda population?
sentences.chinese: 人類爲大熊貓種羣復壯主要做了些什麼？

sentences.english: EX: Pandas is of great significance in the establishment of diplomatic relations with other countries.
sentences.chinese: 熊貓在我國與其他國家建立外交關係上意義非凡。

definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to join in the fun/to get in on the action/(fig.) to butt in/to create more trouble
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
